verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Sing Hallelujah to the Lord
(Sing Hallelujah to the Lord)
Sing Hallelujah to the Lord (sing Hallelujah)
Sing Hallelujah, sing Hallelujah (Hallelujah)
Sing Hallelujah to the Lord
(Sing Hallelujah to the Lord)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus is risen from the dead
(Jesus is risen from the dead)
Jesus is risen from the dead, (Jesus is risen)
Jesus is risen, Jesus is risen, (Hallelujah)
Jesus is risen from the dead
(Jesus is risen from the dead)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Jesus is living in His church
(Jesus is living in His church)
Jesus is living in His church (Jesus is living)
Jesus is living, Jesus is living
Jesus is living in His church
(Jesus is living in His church)

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Jesus is coming back again
(Jesus is coming back again)
Jesus is coming back again (Jesus is coming)
Jesus is coming, Jesus is coming
Jesus is coming back again
(Jesus is coming back again)
